      <script>
        (function(){
          if (typeof Promise === "undefined") {
            return;
          }

          window.listViewFirstAvailabilityResponse = new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

            var requestUrl = "/s-accommodations/api/accommodations/availability?from=SB2&limit=21&destination_id=CIT_6890&checkin=2021-03-30&checkout=2021-03-31&distribution=2&quick=true&token=7TEB7qrXEF&page=1&real_traffic=true";

            xhr.open("GET", requestUrl);

            xhr.setRequestHeader("search-id", "19654ff0-9526-42ba-9359-f9ad257d9012");xhr.setRequestHeader("flow", "shopping");xhr.setRequestHeader("step-flow", "results");xhr.setRequestHeader("product", "hotels");xhr.setRequestHeader("x-client", "s-accommodations");xhr.setRequestHeader("page-view-id", "shopping-accommodations-it-5277df7b-aa6f-4ece-9bc2-998e6ce06e63");xhr.setRequestHeader("x-hash", "%2BpOSsEbWNSX%2FR3ERoBOPOpG11dNrtyU%2B8CZBi6ULdpXkHBTj3W5gxHToDHyiOBbiJOfmxsHkqDXxjTj4nD8uUA%3D%3D");xhr.setRequestHeader("x-user-id", "4f89cb50-59df-4966-89cb-5059df996690");xhr.setRequestHeader("upa-tracking", "pageview");

            xhr.onload = function () {
              if (!!window.performance && !!window.performance.mark) {
                performance.mark('end_availability_request');
              }

              var json = function(responseText) {
                try {
                  return JSON.parse(responseText);
                } catch (e) {
                  return null;
                }
              }

              var parseHeaders = function(headers) {
                var arr = headers.trim().split(/[\r\n]+/);

                // Create a map of header names to values
                var headerMap = {};
                arr.forEach(function (line) {
                  var parts = line.split(': ');
                  var header = parts.shift();
                  var value = parts.join(': ');
                  headerMap[header] = value;
                });

                return headerMap;
              }

              var data = json(xhr.responseText);

              var response = {
                'data': data,
                'requestParams': {"page":1,"reason":"pageview"},
                'acceptQuick': true,
                'status': xhr.status,
                'statusText': xhr.statusText,
                'headers': parseHeaders(xhr.getAllResponseHeaders()),
                'url': requestUrl,
              };

              if (xhr.status === 200 && data !== null) {
                resolve(response);
              } else {
                reject(response);
              }
            };

            xhr.onerror = function() {
              if (!!window.performance && !!window.performance.mark) {
                performance.mark('end_availability_request');
              }

              var response = {
                'data': null,
                'requestParams': {"page":1,"reason":"pageview"},
                'acceptQuick': true,
                'status': xhr.status,
                'statusText': xhr.statusText,
                'url': requestUrl,
              };
              reject(response);
            };

            if (!!window.performance && !!window.performance.mark) {
              performance.mark('start_availability_request');
            }

            xhr.send();
          });
        })();
      </script>

precio</h3></div></div><div class="modal-content dc-modal-content"><div class="eva-3-separator separator-dc-pb-modal"></div></div></div></div></div></aloha-jeff-direcc-component-container><div Se destaca por tener una excelente relación entre precio, calidad y servicio. Por eso y los comentarios de nuestros clientes, te lo recomendamos. No lo dejes escapar, convierte a este hotel en un hogar para tu viaje.</p><!----></span></span></span></aloha-tooltip><!----><!----></aloha-preferential-icon><!----><span _ngcontent-s-accommodations-c127="" class="accommodation-name -eva-3-ellipsis">Hotel La Riviera</span></div></aloha-cluster-accommodation-name><aloha-location-name _ngcontent-s-accommodations-c132="" class="-eva-3-mt-sm -eva-3-mr-sm eva-3-p"><span class="-eva-3-tc-gray-2"> Santa Marta, Gaira. A 5,13 km del centro
